title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column
description: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
OB: When selecting the second column and pressing the delete key, the behavior is inconsistent between the two methods.
EB: When you select the second column and press delete on the keyboard or choose delete from the context menu, they should both produce the same result.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the attached file in bug 124598. In the file, the second table has a list/grid nested in its group header and a merged group header row.
2. Select the second column.
3. Press the delete key on your keyboard.
